urls.title: Ethereum Fusaka Upgrade: Everything you need to know
urls.description: What is Ethereum Fusaka Upgrade, its key features and benefits? How will Fusaka EIP-7594, EIP-7935, EIP-7825, EIP-7951 and the other EIPs impact Ethereum Ecosystem?

data.text:
Ethereum already leads for the institutional market, and this is just the beginning.

Wall Street trusts it with the majority of:

â€¢ Tokenized funds
â€¢ Stablecoins
â€¢ Tokenized equity

Fusaka expands future capacity as institutional adoption grows, without sacrificing the core

3/ Better network resilience.

Fusaka lowers hardware and bandwidth requirements for nodes, enabling more full nodes and more home validators.

More validators â†’ greater decentralization â†’ higher institutional confidence.

1/ Lower data posting costs.

Fusaka reduces L2 data posting costs, which cuts rollup fees by 15â€“60%.

For high-volume institutional flows of tokenized funds, stablecoins and DeFi participants these are big cost savings.

The Fusaka upgrade is going live tomorrow on Ethereum mainnet.

Itâ€™s a turning point for institutions exploring onchain settlement, tokenization, and scalable financial infrastructure.
